channel.title: Fetching the person with the most Points?
channel.description:
yeh.. i herd of it somewhere i just cant remember. how could i, fetch the name of the player with the most Champion Points on my server? ( yes my CP system works, and saves and reads the token, this would just display the name of the person with the MOST points)
:|

item.title: Fetching the person with the most Points?
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

lovescaper, good idea.

but,

for (int i = 0; i >= player.players.length; i ++) { if (player.players[i].ChampPoints >= 100) { sendMessage("HighScore CP Over 100: " & player.players[i]); } }

the error|:

[code]client.java:2169: package player does not exist
for (int i = 0; i >= player.players.length; i ++)
^
client.java:2171: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable player
location: class client
if (player.players[i].ChampPoints >= 100)
^
client.java:2173: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable player
location: class client
sendMessage("HighScore CP Over 100: " & player.players[i]);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
3 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Fetching the person with the most Points?

item.description:

for (int i = 0; i >= player.players.length; i ++) { if (player.players[i].CP >= 100) { sendMessage("HighScore CP Over 100: " & player.players[i]); } } or something like that
